title: AI in Dentistry: Transforming Dental Care with Confidence
description: Innovations in healthcare technology have brought artificial intelligence (AI) into the dental care landscape, garnering growing acceptance and confidence among patients. Recent findings from a survey conducted by VideaHealth, a dental AI software firm, shed light on the potential of AI to reshape dental care and address longstanding concerns. This article explores the impact of […]

title: Wondery Faces Backlash Over ‘Striker’ – The AI Sports Podcast Host Stirring Debate
description: In a surprising turn of events, Wondery, the podcasting giant under Amazon’s umbrella, finds itself in hot water over the recent debut of an AI sports podcast host named ‘Striker.’ This artificial intelligence entity made its presence known at the conclusion of The Lead: Starting Five, a daily sports podcast produced by Wondery. Geotargeted exclusively […]

title: Japanese Scientists Generate Mental Images from Brain Activity Using AI
description: Japanese scientists have achieved a remarkable milestone by generating mental images of objects and landscapes directly from human brain activity through the application of artificial intelligence (AI) technology. This cutting-edge research, conducted by a collaborative team from the National Institutes for Quantum Science and Technology, another national institute, and Osaka University, marks a significant leap […]
